interface.name: MultivariateVectorFunction
interface.javadoc:
An interface representing a multivariate vectorial function.
$Id: MultivariateVectorFunction.java 1462485 2013-03-29 14:36:19Z psteitz $
2.0

Compute the value for the function at the given point.
point point at which the function must be evaluated
function value for the given point
IllegalArgumentException if point's dimension is wrong
